job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Job Description</p><p><br></p><p>As a Software Engineer, you will:</p><p><br></p><p>Be involved in full-stack web application development with a variety of languages and frameworks including Python, TypeScript, HTML, React, Flask, Postgres, etc.</p><p>Work closely with our PM and design teams to define feature specifications and build impactful products.</p><p>Work closely with operations to build user-friendly data visualization and processing software.</p><p><br></p><p>Minimum Qualifications</p><p><br></p><p>1-2+ years of experience in full stack web development</p><p>B.S. Computer Science or related technical field preferred, fresh grad is also ok.</p><p>Experience with Python and Javascript required</p><p>1-2+ years of experience with Python</p><p>1-2+ years of experience with Javascript</p><p>1-2+ years of experience with relational databases and SQL</p><p>Experience in ReactJS and Flask preferred</p><p>Experience with AWS and GCP a plus</p><p>Experience with AI a plus</p><p>*********************************************************************</p><p><br></p><p>We're urgently in need for a Senior Software Engineers.</p><p>Know anyone who might be interested?</p><p>Please fill-up on the below link, attach your updated CV and don't forget to take the coding challenge!!!</p><p>Kindly mention my name on "referred by"&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>https://lnkd.in/gmZYssbT</p><p><br></p><p>#SWE</p><p>#softwareengineerjobs</p><p>#remotework</p><p>#hiring</p><p>#careers</p><p>#nowhiring</p><p><br></p><p><br></p>
